author: llunerti
body: Update of GeneratorInterface-EvtGenInterface to the new tag V02-04-00 in order to use new pdl files added in https://github.com/cms-data/GeneratorInterface-EvtGenInterface/pull/18. This is needed for the central production of UL Bs->MuMu samples.
title: [10.6.X] Update of GeneratorInterface-EvtGenInterface tag in cmsswdata.txt
